sources.title: Tanned Legs 1929 Colorized
sources.description: This movie became Public Domain on 1 January 2025. Endearing comedy with some musical numbers, about a group of vacationers at a beach resort and their various romantic entanglements. Stars include a very young Arthur Lake (Dagwood in the Blondie movies) and Sally Blane (sister of Loretta Young). IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0020480/reference/ Colorized using DeOldify, AviSynth and VirtualDub2. (Note: Although the movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use only. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. The one exception is Lost n Found Films on YouTube, who I authorise to use my colorizations. Thanks.)
